attributes.action: dissolve parliament at the earliest available opportunity and call an immediate General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We've had enough! 11 years in power, 11 years of corruption and scandal. It's time to stop this folly and let the British population decide what's best for the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
